item.title: Install Void Linux on VirtualBox
item.description: Sources https://linuxiac.com/void-linux-installation/ https://techviewleo.com/install-void-linux-on-virtualbox-vmware-workstation/ https://docs.voidlinux.org/installation/guides/chroot.html Goals Host OS: Windows Virtualization software: VirtualBox Guest OS: Void Linux Hostname: vivo One non-root user with sudo rights, named me Network access through the host system A tiling window manager: dwm Development tools: python, nodejs, gcc, clang, neovim Webservers etc running in the VM are reachable from the host system Prerequisites VirtualBox: https://www.virtualbox.org/ A Linux live .iso file, like for instance the ``Void Linux libc base'' one: https://repo-default.
